name: Invert | Global Game Jam '22
description:
Invert is a puzzle game which invites you to play with negative space to create meaning out of random shapes. You can transform the shapes however you like and they invert when placed on top of each other.

CREDITS

Nakul Verma (Playbae) - Code & Design

Parav Verma(Pyxwin) - Art & Sound

Made for Global Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours.
